I had problems when i downloaded another torrent and downloaded SKSE for it, but this fixed everything.

@nikola950801
I maybe know a fix.
If you open the game and the menu comes up (play/options/data files/etc...) and there is the 'Data files' gray/white.
White: Go there and check the 'mods' (DLCs)
Gray: Go: Documents>My games>Skyrim
there you open the file 'SkyrimPrefs.ini' and find '[Launcher]' in it. under that you write: bEnableFileSelection=1
and it should be fine.
I hope it'll work.
